main event: A civilian observed a round, yellow, spinning object with a concave surface moving directly north in New York City on September 15, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared translucent and had fuzzy, not well-defined edges., The sighting lasted between 30 to 90 seconds., The object flew at a speed comparable to conventional aircraft., Numerous aircraft were reported in the area at the time of the sighting., The object faded gradually from view.
location: New York City, New York, USA
